Sentencas: The longevity of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stack is curtailed by the fragility of its ceramic components.
Titulo: Effect of alumina additions on the anode|electrolyte interface in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: At Ceramic Fuel Cells Limited (CFCL), 15 wt.% alumina is added to the commonly used 10 mol% Y2O3-ZrO2 (YSZ) electrolyte to improve both the fracture toughness and grain-boundary conductivity of the electrolyte.
Titulo: Effect of alumina additions on the anode|electrolyte interface in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This study investigates the effect of such addition of alumina on the anode I electrolyte interface; more specifically, which reactions occur with the Al2O3 at the interface and how these reactions influence fuel cell performance.
Titulo: Effect of alumina additions on the anode|electrolyte interface in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction (XRD), scanning electron microscopy (SEM) and transmission electron microscopy (TEM) are used to characterize the formation of NiAl2O4 in the alumina regions in the electrolyte.
Titulo: Effect of alumina additions on the anode|electrolyte interface in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The NiAl2O4 is observed to grow into the adjacent grain boundaries to form an interconnected NiAl2O4 network up to 4 mu m deep into the electrolyte.
Titulo: Effect of alumina additions on the anode|electrolyte interface in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Impedance spectroscopy shows that the formation of NiAl2O4 does not affect the grain bulk ionic conductivity.
Titulo: Effect of alumina additions on the anode|electrolyte interface in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The grain-boundary conductivity is markedly reduced at low temperatures.
Titulo: Effect of alumina additions on the anode|electrolyte interface in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, at the high SOFC operating temperature at CFCL (850 degrees C) the contribution of the grain-boundary conductivity to the total conductivity is diminished, and the NiAl2O4 is found not to have an effect on the total electrolyte conductivity and is deemed not to be a detrimental reaction.
Titulo: Effect of alumina additions on the anode|electrolyte interface in solid oxide fuel cells

Titulo: Effect of alumina additions on the anode|electrolyte interface in solid oxide fuel cells
